name: Italian/English Cultural Exchange
description: A chance to get together and have a friendly chat in Italian and English! Open to all those interested in Italian culture, all levels of conversational ability welcome.

events.details: This is a very informal event and everybody is very welcome to join :) You don't need to be fluent in Italian! If the weather is nice we can go to the park opposite the venue. A friend has also got a guitar so we can listen to some Italian songs :) Looking forward to seeing you there!

location.address: Left Handed Giant Brewpub, Hawkins Lane, Finzels Reach, BS1 6EU

booking.details: Please mark as going on the Meetup page to help the organiser get an idea of numbers.
